short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: automationBuddy tool to extract data-qa attributes. Created by Gaurang Bharadiya

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights data-qa attributes on any web page and captures the attribute values, it generates c# locators based on the values and allows a user to copy the locators. Allows user to remove highlights. Best Practice button provides some info on standard practice when adding attribute values for different types of DOM elements.
